document_data.name: Kheshebik
document_data.mainbody:
'''Kheshebik''' was a [[giant crocodile]] who the [[Khoroshen]] tribe of [[lizardfolk]] believed to be an avatar of the deity [[Semuanya]], making sacrifices to him.{{Cite dungeon/144/The Muster of Morach Tor|24}} He lived in a cavern beneath [[Baeniff Tor]]{{Cite dungeon/144/The Muster of Morach Tor|25}} and was blind.{{Cite dungeon/144/The Muster of Morach Tor|26}}

{{stub}}
